titleInfo.title: Thrill Billy Love Fest at 12th & Porter

mods.abstract: Two color window card (black and red on white) announcing the Thrill Billy Love Fest with Hank Flamingo and Kristi Rose, plus many backwoods beauties, at 12th and Porter on October 27.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
